title: Solar light-assisted electrochemical CO2 reduction on Boron-doped Diamond cathode
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Accepted Manuscript

Goki Iwai, Andrea Fiorani, Chiaki Terashima, Yasuaki Einaga
In this study, photoelectrochemical water oxidation with a hematite (Î±-Fe2O3) photoanode and electrochemical CO2 reduction with a boron-doped diamond (BDD) cathode were combined to convert CO2 into formic acid under...
